title: New: Ayelle – Boy
body:
Swedish-Iranian singer **Ayelle** has spent the past couple of years piecing together a solid collection of tracks, both her own solo work and the occasional feature here and there; all forming one of the most coherent bodies of work of any emerging artist.

Her latest, _Boy_, is perhaps her most self-assured yet, teaming up with Mucky on production (Sevdaliza), really bringing tinges of FKA Twigs and BANKS to Ayelle’s unique brand of sultry, romantic R&B. Check it out below.
